text: Amanda Seyfried Net Worth: Amanda Seyfried is an American actress, singer and former model who has a net worth of $10 million. Amanda Seyfried was born December 3, 1985 in Allentown, Pennsylvania. Seyfried began her public career as a child model (ages 11 to 15) then broke into acting by means of soap operas (As the World Turns and All My Children). She then landed a supporting role in HBO's Big Love and was then cast in the film Mean Girls. Her first major lead film role was in Mamma Mia!, co-starring Meryl Streep and Pierce Brosnan. Amanda Seyfried turned heads (and ears) in her singing role in the big screen adaptation of Les Les Misérables (2012), alongside costars Hugh Jackman, Anne Hathaway and Russell Crowe. Her other appearances include leading roles in Jennifer's Body (2009), Chloe (2009), Dear John (2010), Letters to Juliet (2010), Red Riding Hood (2011), In Time (2011), Gone (2012), Lovelace (2013) and A Million Ways to Die in the West (2014). Moviefone ranked her in its 25 Under 25: Hollywood's Hottest Young Stars list each year from 2008 to 2010. Glamour magazine voted Seyfried Most Down-to-Earth (2010) and ranked her No. 3 on its 50 Most Glamorous Women of 2010 list. People magazine honored her beauty with appearances in its special issues: Most Beautiful 2009—Beautiful at Every Age (ranked No. 4), Most Beautiful 2010 (Seyfried appearing without wearing makeup), 25 Beauties (and Hotties) at 25 (ranked No. 1) and 2012 Most Beautiful at Every Age.
